thread.title: BRIEF-Kayne Anderson MLP Investment Company Enters Into $150 Mln Revolving Credit Facility

title: BRIEF-Kayne Anderson MLP Investment Company Enters Into $150 Mln Revolving Credit Facility
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Kayne Anderson Mlp Investment Co:
* KAYNE ANDERSON MLP INVESTMENT COMPANY ENTERS INTO $150 MILLION REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY
* KAYNE ANDERSON MLP INVESTMENT CO - ‍CREDIT FACILITY HAS A 364-DAY TERM, MATURING ON FEB 15, 2019​
* KAYNE ANDERSON MLP INVESTMENT - ‍CREDIT FACILITY REPLACES CO‘S $150 MILLION UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY THAT WAS SCHEDULED TO MATURE ON FEBRUARY 28 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
